    BeliefUpdaters.BeliefUpdaters
    BeliefUpdaters.DiscreteBelief — Type.
    DiscreteBelief

    A belief specified by a probability vector.

    Normalization of b is NOT enforced at all times, but the DiscreteBeleif(pomdp, b) constructor will warn, and update(...) always returns a belief with normalized b.

    BeliefUpdaters.DiscreteUpdater
    BeliefUpdaters.FastPreviousObservationUpdater
    BeliefUpdaters.KMarkovUpdater — Type.

    Updater that stores the k most recent observations as the belief.

    BeliefUpdaters.NothingUpdater
    BeliefUpdaters.PreviousObservationUpdater — Type.

    Updater that stores the most recent observation as the belief, missing if none is available.

    BeliefUpdaters.uniform_belief — Function.
